item.title: ‘Bridgerton’ Production Designer Alison Gartshore Dissects That Beautiful Botanical Ball: “It Pushed Everyone to the Limit”
item.description: This particular ball required a ton of faux florals and a mechanical centerpiece that unfolded to wow the Queen.
